Title: Be ready to assemble at the first call and be capable of fighting and winning
Designer: Shanghai No. 3 Printing and Dyeing Mill Revolutionary committee political propaganda group (上海第三印染厂革委会政宣组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: An armed worker standing guard. The industrial plant in the background is fitted with two anti-aircraft guns and painted with revolutionary slogans.
